name: stpaul-history-portal
description: Comprehensive historical knowledge portal for St. Paul, Minnesota
author: Brett L. Weaver <brett.l.weaver@gmail.com>

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.deploy:azure: az staticwebapp create --name stpaul-history --resource-group stpaul-history-rg --source . --location centralus --branch main
